name: ML.01 - BAG
description: Luxury apparel for your Loot Bags. This token can be burned to redeem a 3D metaverse wearable NFT and a bag of custom 1/1 handcrafted apparel and accessories customized with the items in your Loot bag (synthetic or OG Loot). Free shipping worldwide included. Redemptions to open ~November 2021. Contents of bag (subject to change): Hoodie, Pants, Hat, Socks, Gaiter, Gloves and Drawstring Bag.
